DOC.brief_title: Focal Impulse Rotor Modulation Ablation Trial Treatment Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation ( FIRMAT-PAF )
DOC.detailed_description: A total 188 subject enrolled-subjects equally ( 1:1 ) randomize undergoing conventional atrial fibrillation ablation confirmation pulmonary vein isolation ( PVI ) versus actively treat FIRM procedure without PVI .
